TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DesignerActionListsChangedType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of change occurring in a collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The DesignerActionListsChangedType enumeration indicates that an element has been added or removed from a managed collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects. This enumeration is used in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> class, which is associated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
> [!NOTE] > Although the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> class is a collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects, it does not directly raise events. Instead, the owning <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> raises <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> events.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType ActionListsAdded = int32(0)

Docs.summary: One or more T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True objects have been added to the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType ActionListsRemoved = int32(1)

Docs.summary: One or more T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True objects have been removed from the collection.
